long_description: Giro Civila Bike Shoes for women provide comfort as you ride, and style and walking traction when you get to your destination. High-quality, perforated microfiber uppers feature nonslip laces and a micro-suede heel counter. Injected nylon outsoles have a 2-bolt cleat mount, replaceable high-traction walking pads and scuff guards at midfoot. Molded EVA footbeds provide a microsuede topsheet and medium arch support. Antimicrobial treatment in the Giro Civila Bike Shoes for women helps manage odor.
short_description: Giro Civila Bike Shoes for women provide comfort as you ride, and style and walking traction when you get to your destination.
